root: ^In a bleak, rain-soaked metropolis where poisonous smog hugged rotting spires, Dr. Hyde walked the foul, frozen streets.
^His creation—a drug meant to strengthen human immunity to this poisonous wasteland—had instead sparked a plague,
^turning once-human souls into mindless, ravenous husks, starting the age of apocalypse.
^Now, burdened with guilt and desperate hope, he embarked on a journey to a fabled time portal that could undo the apocalypse.
^"I..have to do this. Even if it means sacrificing everything I had"
